name: Bread man the game: 3D shooter
description:
It is game aboute bread man . It is 3D shooter
controls:
WASD - walk
Shift - Run

Left mouse button - shoot

1 -  time stop (ability regeneration every 21 sec)
2 - lasers (ability regeneration every 16 sec)
3 - rage  (ability regeneration every 11 sec)
